## OptionalStateType type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type OptionalStateType<D extends StateType> = StateType<
  StateTypeSerializedType<D> | undefined,
  Optional<StateTypeValueType<D>>,
  | {
      defined: false
      create(value?: StateTypeSerializedType<D>): void
    }
  | (StateTypeReturnType<D> & {
      defined: true
      remove(): void
    })
>
```
